content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple recovery updates attempted to deploy a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) to supply Automation Science Packs, but none of these placements succeeded. Although references were made to existing smelting devices—a furnace at (5.0, 5.0) for iron plate production and a copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0) for copper plate production—these were retrieved from the environment and not newly created by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• API Call Errors with get_entities
 – Use the correct function signature when calling get_entities. Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments like “radius” or extra positional arguments.
• Lab Placement Validation
 – Confirm that a Lab exists in the inventory before attempting placement to prevent placement failures.
• Lab Crafting Failures
 – Verify that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron‑gear‑wheel, electronic‑circuit, and copper‑cable) are available in sufficient quantities prior to crafting. Ensure that prerequisite production steps (like smelting and related crafting of base items) are completed.
• Handling Non‐Iterable Returns
 – When retrieving entities (e.g. labs), use fallback checks so that a None return value is treated as an empty list rather than leading to iteration errors.
